mapper.sql: a.PLATFORM_LOG_ID AS platformLogId , a.USERNAME AS username , a.MODULE AS module , a.OPERATION AS operation , a.METHOD AS method , a.PARAMS AS params , a.IP AS ip , a.CREATE_DATE AS createDate , a.DEL_FLAG AS delFlag
mapper.select:
select
from SYS_PLATFORM_LOG a
a.DEL_FLAG = 0
AND a.USERNAME like '%${username}%'
AND a.MODULE = #{module}
AND a.OPERATION = #{operation}
AND DATE_FORMAT(a.CREATE_DATE,'%Y%m%d%H%i%s') >= DATE_FORMAT(#{startCreateTime},'%Y%m%d%H%i%s')
AND DATE_FORMAT(a.CREATE_DATE,'%Y%m%d%H%i%s') <= DATE_FORMAT(#{endCreateTime},'%Y%m%d%H%i%s')
AND a.OPERATION = '用户登录'
AND a.MODULE = '调度管理'
AND a.MODULE <> '调度管理' AND a.OPERATION <> '用户登录'
